issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add predicate push-down
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9619](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9619). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Like the title says, add an optimizer to push filters down the plan as farther as logically possible.
